topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562f9726368723e39181b00#post_5562f9726368723e39181b00
The ai in the game is so over the top that they actually had to dumb the ai down cause the original ai, which you can install via mods, is so unbelievably hard that it's the fps equivalent of dark souls level hard gameplay wise.

Legitimately do not install the original ai for the enemies unless you're ready for a severe asskicking.

The out of the box gameplay has the enemy ai smart enough to lay covering fire and make you think that they're trying to storm from the front when in reality they're buying time for their allies to flank you and then the ones from the front will throw a grenade at you making you go "oh shit!" and cause you to run right into their allies that are behind you. . . and that's the dumbed down version.

If you play the games save very often.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562fbc26368723e39a91e00#post_5562fbc26368723e39a91e00
So I have to utilize actual combat tactics to win. Does it have a stealth system?
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562fe4463687209a3400500#post_5562fe4463687209a3400500
There's a visibility and sound meter.  If you have your flashlight on at night goodbye; if you're rapidly running around goodbye.  You legitimately have to think about it tactically cause the enemies don't have a alert cooldown; they don't have the attention span of a fish; unless you silent kill a enemy they're going to notice; if you leave a body out in the middle of the road they're going to notice.

!https://31.media.tumblr.com/8a27ed556cbb728b3a9f3f340ab8e72e/tumblr_inline_n2293u4tLj1qdvqd9.gif!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

It's like real life except it's not. Yeah, I'll go for it.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55630044636872290a543c00#post_55630044636872290a543c00
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. shadow of chernobyl is the first and pretty good one.  The biggest problem with it gameplay wise though is that you can't fix your guns so think about what gun has the most common/cheapest ammo that is pretty decent and have a backup badass gun for when you really need it and try to keep light.

Clear Sky has a repair mechanism, a faction mechanism and a upgrade mechanism.  You can upgrade your guns with stuff real life parts on real life guns; they won't make the gun shoot faster or such, but drastically reduce recoil.

Call of Pripyat is gameplay wise the best out of the three, but it's also the shortest cause the studio was getting fucked over budget wise.  Call of Pripyat is about half the gameplay hours as the other games.  I would not suggest getting this alone cause of how short it is.

I would buy the package deal on steam cause all three games are only $40

topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556313186368727513391e00#post_556313186368727513391e00
Ok, here are some points.

Pegasus.

Noticeable dark eye shadow or just tired eyes.
Cream coat.
Tufts blue mane.
Long, unkept hair (mane and tail)
Hair over one eye (either side).
Azure eyes.
Cutie mark of a dog collar with spikes around a bone.

Looks as if you just got out of bed and have little to no care of personal hygiene. Maybe a loner type with an awkward personality.

topics.body:
*in interrogation room*

*Interrogator*: "Tell me where you hid the files."
*Pompous bastard*: "NEVER!"
*Interrogator*: "Tell me or else I'll let the French man have his way with you."
*Not French*: "I'm not French by the way."
*Pompous bastard*: "Ha! You think that'll scare me?! You and you _French man_ are barking too much and yet, shown no bite."
*Not French*: "I'm not French."
*Interrogator*: "Oh, you're being cocky huh? This French man will do way worse than what I'll do to you."
*Not French*: "For the last time, I am not French! I only live there! I'm actually British."
*Pompous bastard*: "Haha! Look at you! You fail to impress me, let alone scare me! You are but failures! Especially you, _French man!_"
*Not French*: ... *dark glare*
*Interrogator*: Urgh, this is no use. French, do your thing.
*Not French*: *pulls out baguette*
*Pompous bastard*: "A piece of bread? What are you going to do?! Feed me?"
*Not French*: "Oh, I am gonna do _far worse._"
*Interrogator*: ...
*Pompous bastard*: ...
*Not French*: ... *creepy smile*
*Pompous bastard*: "ALRIGHT ALRIGHT! I'LL TALK! JUST DON'T LET THE FRENCH MAN TOUCH ME!"
*Interrogator*: "Wow, you did well. And you didn't even have to do anything, Frenchy."
*Not French*: "Call me French again and I'll do to you what I was about to do to him."
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
